page.title: 20Life style of a local girl
page.content: My name is M.Gibson. The year is 1985. On Monday 1st. July I got up at 7 a.m. washed and did my hair, then dressed. When I got downstairs, my brother Stephen was leaving for work on his motor-bike. I had breakfast, a glass of milk and cup of tea, then let Pep, my dog, outside. I got my books ready for School, Jayne came and we went for the bus. We called for crisps and some "chuddy" on the way. The bus came at 8 o' clock and we all got on and went to school at Silloth. We registered, then went to lessons. First lesson for me was metalwork. After break we worked on the{ Domesday Project. }After that was P.E., when I practised putting the shot. For lunch I bought a brown roll with cheese and solid cream - 37p. At afternoon assembly we talked about 'Openings Day' activities. For the afternoon lesson, we had sci-mat.
